law.catch_line: Telemarketer prohibited from contacting credit card issuer to obtain account number -- Issuer prohibited from providing account number.

text.section: A telemarketer shall not contact a credit card issuer, in writing or by telephone, facsimile, computer, or by any other means, for the purpose of obtaining a consumer's credit card account number.
A credit card issuer shall not provide a consumer's credit card account number to a telemarketer.

law.history: Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 18, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2002.
